title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our driving school

faq.question: How long does it take to get a driving license?
faq.answer: The time varies depending on your progress and practice frequency. On average, it takes 3-6 months with regular lessons and practice.

faq.question: What is the minimum age to start driving lessons?
faq.answer: You can start driving lessons at age 16 with a learner's permit. However, you cannot take the practical test until you turn 18.

faq.question: Do I need to complete all courses before the practical test?
faq.answer: Yes, you must complete Handledarkurs and Risk1 before taking your practical driving test. Risk2 and other courses may be required depending on your license type.

faq.question: Can I use my own car for driving lessons?
faq.answer: Yes, you can use your own car if it meets safety requirements and has dual controls. However, we recommend using our school vehicles for optimal learning.

faq.question: What happens if I fail the driving test?
faq.answer: Don't worry! You can retake the test after additional practice. We'll help you identify areas for improvement and prepare for your next attempt.

faq.question: Do you offer lessons in languages other than Swedish?
faq.answer: Yes, we have instructors who speak English, Arabic, and other languages. Please specify your language preference when booking.

faq.question: How much does it cost to get a driving license?
faq.answer: The total cost varies based on how many lessons you need. Check our price list for detailed information about course and lesson fees.

faq.question: Can I book lessons online?
faq.answer: Yes, you can book lessons through our online booking system or by calling our office during business hours.

faq.question: What should I bring to my first lesson?
faq.answer: Bring your learner's permit, photo ID, and comfortable clothing. We provide all necessary safety equipment and instruction materials.

faq.question: Is parking included in driving lessons?
faq.answer: Yes, our comprehensive driving lessons include parking practice, highway driving, city driving, and all skills needed for the test.
